column1: It is clear from the above grounds of appeal, that the Appellants are

under  a  clear  misconception  about  the  jurisdiction  of 
the  Magistrate's

Court,  when  an  application  under  Section  5(1)(b)  of 
the  State  Lands
(Recovery of Possession) Act No.7 of 1979 and when it proceeds to inquire

from  a  Respondent, 
to  whom  summons  were  served  and  who  has
appeared before Court and inform that he has cause to show as to  why an
order of ejectment should not be made against him.
